title: Josie Duffy Rice | Bolton Tries to Cash in with Trump Book: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Trump’s ex-national security adviser trying to cash in with a tell-all book after refusing to testify in Trump’s impeachment trial.

Then, journalist Josie Duffy Rice, president of The Appeal, shares her appreciation for people taking the time to educate themselves during the fight for racial equality and says that she will not be wasting her time on "All Lives Matter" posts.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
